tokens.name: BUTTBOTTOM / SOL

- **Time Frame:** Medium volume → 2h to 6h (mid: 4h).  
- **Trade Flow:** Balanced buy dominance (41-50% buys) confirms bullish flow, aligning with aggressive BUY parameters.

tokens.name: WASP / SOL

- **Volatility (24.8% price change):** Medium volatility → **-2% to -5% limit** (entered at -3%).  
- **Volume ($70,888):** High volume → **+20% to +40% TP** (midpoint at +25%).
